wikipedia_page.main: Tom Wilkie (born 1876) was a Scottish footballer who played as a defender for Liverpool in The Football League. Wilkie signed for Liverpool from Hearts during the 1895–96 season, appearing in 20 of the 30 matches during the season. Wilkie established himself as the first choice left-back the following season appearing in 25 consecutive matches. However, he played less frequently the following seasons and he was eventually sold to Portsmouth F.C., for whom he made 178 appearances during his five years at the club.
